mapper.select: /* retrieveCommentList */ SELECT CO.QNA_NO , CO.USER_CODE , (SELECT ID FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = CO.USER_CODE) AS USER_ID , CO.USER_COMMENT_NO , CO.USER_COMMENT , CO.COMMENT_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE QNA_NO =#{qnaNo}) AS CO_COMMENT_COUNT FROM TB_COMMENT CO WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode}

/* retrieveComment */ SELECT CO.QNA_NO , CO.USER_CODE , (SELECT ID FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_CODE = CO.USER_CODE) AS USER_ID , CO.USER_COMMENT_NO , CO.USER_COMMENT , CO.COMMENT_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE QNA_NO =#{qnaNo}) AS COMMENT_COUNT FROM TB_COMMENT CO WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo} AND USER_CODE = #{userCode}
